trans-unit.source: This topic and its sub-topics provides the JSON format that is supported by the older versions of Azure PowerShell.
trans-unit.target: This topic and its sub-topics provides the JSON format that is supported by the older versions of Azure PowerShell.

trans-unit.source: If you are using the July 2015 Release version of Azure PowerShell or later, see <link xlink:href="718acc04-33c3-4511-9090-4ebab4361b98" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">SQL Server Stored Procedure Activity</link> for the latest JSON format.
trans-unit.target: If you are using the July 2015 Release version of Azure PowerShell or later, see <link xlink:href="718acc04-33c3-4511-9090-4ebab4361b98" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">SQL Server Stored Procedure Activity</link> for the latest JSON format.

trans-unit.source: You can convert the JSON from old format to new format by using the tool: <externalLink><linkText>JSON Upgrade Tool</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=618507</linkUri></externalLink>
trans-unit.target: You can convert the JSON from old format to new format by using the tool: <externalLink><linkText>JSON Upgrade Tool</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=618507</linkUri></externalLink>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <embeddedLabel>Stored Procedure Activity</embeddedLabel> in an Azure Data Factory pipeline to invoke a stored procedure in an Azure SQL database from the pipeline.
trans-unit.target: You can use the <embeddedLabel>Stored Procedure Activity</embeddedLabel> in an Azure Data Factory pipeline to invoke a stored procedure in an Azure SQL database from the pipeline.

trans-unit.source: In the JSON definition of the activity, you need to do the following:
trans-unit.target: In the JSON definition of the activity, you need to do the following:

trans-unit.source: Set the <embeddedLabel>Type</embeddedLabel> of the activity to <embeddedLabel>StoredProcedureActivity</embeddedLabel>.
trans-unit.target: Set the <embeddedLabel>Type</embeddedLabel> of the activity to <embeddedLabel>StoredProcedureActivity</embeddedLabel>.

trans-unit.source: Specify the name of the stored procedure for the <embeddedLabel>storedProcedureName</embeddedLabel> property.
trans-unit.target: Specify the name of the stored procedure for the <embeddedLabel>storedProcedureName</embeddedLabel> property.

trans-unit.source: Specify values for stored procedure parameters in the <embeddedLabel>storedProcedureParameters</embeddedLabel> section.
trans-unit.target: Specify values for stored procedure parameters in the <embeddedLabel>storedProcedureParameters</embeddedLabel> section.

trans-unit.source: Ensure that the output table uses a <embeddedLabel>linked service</embeddedLabel> that links the <embeddedLabel>Azure SQL Database</embeddedLabel> to the data factory.
trans-unit.target: Ensure that the output table uses a <embeddedLabel>linked service</embeddedLabel> that links the <embeddedLabel>Azure SQL Database</embeddedLabel> to the data factory.

trans-unit.source: Specify the schedule in the <embeddedLabel>output</embeddedLabel> (availability section of the JSON) to specify when the activity is started.
trans-unit.target: Specify the schedule in the <embeddedLabel>output</embeddedLabel> (availability section of the JSON) to specify when the activity is started.

trans-unit.source: The names and casing (upper/lower) of stored procedure parameters in the JSON file must match the names of stored procedure parameters in the target database.
trans-unit.target: The names and casing (upper/lower) of stored procedure parameters in the JSON file must match the names of stored procedure parameters in the target database.
